body: I have a class with a internal array field.  I want to expose this array as a property, such that it maintains as much funtionallity of the orginal array but does not violate encapsulation by exposing the array directly.  What are the various methods and pros and cons?  I'm thinking specifically about `IList<T>` or `Colleciton<T>`
title: IList<T> versus Collection<T> as property
